title: Erdős Problem #19
description: If ... is an edge-disjoint union of ... copies of ... then is ...?

overview.historicalContext: Erdős Problem #19 from erdosproblems.com. Originally offered with a prize of $500.
overview.problemStatement: If $G$ is an edge-disjoint union of $n$ copies of $K_n$ then is $\chi(G)=n$?
